SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel.SocketServer
public class SocketServer extends Object
This class represents a server that listens for incoming client connections via sockets and manages communication with connected clients.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor to initialize a SocketServer object.

    Description

    Adds a ModelMessage to the queue for all connected clients or a specific client.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServer

      public SocketServer(int port, NetworkManager manager)
      Constructor to initialize a SocketServer object.
      Parameters:
      port - The port number on which the server listens for incoming connections.
      manager - The NetworkManager instance for managing network operations.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer(SocketServer server) throws IOException
      Starts the server on the specified port, accepting incoming client connections and spawning a new SocketClientHandler thread for each client connection.
      Parameters:
      server - The SocketServer instance to start.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while starting the server.

    • setClientsConnected

      public void setClientsConnected(double id, Socket socket)
      Sets a client's socket connection in the map of connected clients.
      Parameters:
      id - The client's ID.
      socket - The socket connection associated with the client.

    • getServerSocket

      public ServerSocket getServerSocket()
      Retrieves the ServerSocket instance of this server.
      Returns:
      The ServerSocket instance.

    • setClientsOut

      public void setClientsOut(double id, ObjectOutputStream out)
      Sets a client's ObjectOutputStream in the map of output streams for connected clients.
      Parameters:
      id - The client's ID.
      out - The ObjectOutputStream associated with the client.

    • getClientsConnected

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Double,Socket> getClientsConnected()
      Retrieves the map of connected clients and their associated sockets.
      Returns:
      The ConcurrentHashMap of client IDs mapped to their sockets.

    • getClientsOut

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Double,ObjectOutputStream> getClientsOut()
      Retrieves the map of connected clients and their associated ObjectOutputStreams.
      Returns:
      The ConcurrentHashMap of client IDs mapped to their ObjectOutputStreams.

    • unRegisterClient

      public void unRegisterClient(double id) throws IOException
      Unregisters a client by closing its ObjectOutputStream and Socket.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the client to unregister.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while closing the streams or socket.

    • addToClientQueue

      public void addToClientQueue(ModelMessage msg)
      Adds a ModelMessage to the queue for all connected clients or a specific client.
      Parameters:
      msg - The ModelMessage to send to clients.
